trans-unit.source: Provides a base class that exposes an element to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma classe base que expõe um elemento [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: When [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] queries the root of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] application about an element, the root returns the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer for that element.
trans-unit.target: Quando [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] consultas a raiz de um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] a raiz de aplicativo sobre um elemento, retorna o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] ponto a ponto para esse elemento.

trans-unit.source: The peer also responds to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] queries about its corresponding element.
trans-unit.target: O par também responde à [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] consultas sobre o elemento correspondente.

trans-unit.source: Provides initialization for base class values when they are called by the constructor of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a inicialização para valores de classe base quando eles são chamados pelo construtor de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> that is reported to the automation client as a source for all the events that come from this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> que é relatado para o cliente de automação, como uma fonte para todos os eventos que são fornecidos neste <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> that is the source of events.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> que é a origem de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the accelerator key combinations for the element that is associated with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o Acelerador de combinações de tecla para o elemento que está associado com o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: The accelerator key.
trans-unit.target: A chave do acelerador.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey*>

trans-unit.source: If an application responds to keyboard events to provide shortcut key behavior, it should return a string that contains the keyboard shortcut combination.
trans-unit.target: Se um aplicativo responde a eventos de teclado para fornecer o comportamento das teclas de atalho, ele deverá retornar uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a combinação de atalho de teclado.

trans-unit.source: For example, for an element that can copy text to the clipboard, this attached property might be set to the value "CTRL+C".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para um elemento que pode copiar o texto na área de transferência, essa propriedade anexada pode ser definida como o valor "CTRL + C".

trans-unit.source: The accelerator key.
trans-unit.target: A chave do acelerador.

trans-unit.source: Gets the access key for the element that is associated with the automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a chave de acesso para o elemento que está associado com o par de automação.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the access key.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres que contém a chave de acesso.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>

trans-unit.source: An access key (sometimes referred to as a keyboard shortcut or mnemonic) is a character in the text of a menu, menu item, or label of a control such as a button that invokes the associated menu function.
trans-unit.target: Uma chave de acesso (também conhecida como um atalho de teclado ou mnemônico) é um caractere no texto de um menu, o item de menu ou o rótulo de um controle, como um botão que invoca a função de menu associado.

trans-unit.source: For example, to provide a shortcut way to open the `File` menu (for which the access key is typically F), an element might have this attached property set to "ALT+F".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para fornecer uma maneira de atalho para abrir o `File` menu (para que a chave de acesso é normalmente F), um elemento pode ter esta propriedade anexada definida como "ALT + F".

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the access key.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres que contém a chave de acesso.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the element that is associated with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controle para o elemento que está associado com o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] ponto a ponto.

trans-unit.source: The control type.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de controle.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>

trans-unit.source: The control type.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId*> of the element that is associated with the automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId*>do elemento que está associado com o par de automação.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId*>

trans-unit.source: The value of the automation identifier is the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor do identificador de automação é o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>

trans-unit.source: If that property is not set, the value is the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade não for definida, o valor será o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The identifier.
trans-unit.target: O identificador.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId*>

trans-unit.source: The value of the automation identifier is the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor do identificador de automação é o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>

trans-unit.source: If that property is not set, the value is the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade não for definida, o valor será o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the identifier.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres que contém o identificador.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> object that represents the screen coordinates of the element that is associated with the automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> objeto que representa as coordenadas de tela do elemento que está associado com o par de automação.

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo delimitador.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo delimitador.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of GetChildren elements that are represented in the UI Automation tree as immediate child elements of the automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de elementos GetChildren que são representados na árvore de automação de interface do usuário como elementos filho imediato do ponto de automação.

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de elementos filho.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de elementos filho.

trans-unit.source: Gets a name that is used with <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref>, to differentiate the control that is represented by this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um nome que é usado com <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref>, para diferenciar o controle que é representado por esse <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The class name.
trans-unit.target: O nome da classe.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>

trans-unit.source: The class name.
trans-unit.target: O nome da classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> on the element that is associated with the automation peer that responds to a mouse click.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> do elemento que está associado com o par de automação que responde a um mouse, clique em.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element represents a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, a clickable point is any point in the visible client area of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that issues the command that the button represents when it is clicked by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o elemento representa um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, um ponto clicável é qualquer ponto na área do cliente visível a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>que emite o comando que o botão representa quando ele é clicado com o mouse.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: A point in the clickable area of the element.
trans-unit.target: Um ponto na área clicável do elemento.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>

trans-unit.source: A point within the clickable area of the element.
trans-unit.target: Um ponto dentro da área clicável do elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets text that describes the functionality of the control that is associated with the automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o texto que descreve a funcionalidade do controle que está associado com o par de automação.

trans-unit.source: The returned string typically provides the same text that is provided by the tooltip for the control.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres retornada normalmente fornece o mesmo texto que é fornecido pela dica de ferramenta para o controle.

trans-unit.source: The help text.
trans-unit.target: O texto de Ajuda.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*>

trans-unit.source: The help text.
trans-unit.target: O texto de Ajuda.

trans-unit.source: Tells [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] where in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree to place the <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnd" name="hwnd" href=""></xref> being hosted by a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: Informa [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] onde no [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] árvore para colocar o <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnd" name="hwnd" href=""> </xref> hospedada por um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elemento.

trans-unit.source: This method returns the hosted `hwnd` to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] for controls that host `hwnd` objects.
trans-unit.target: Este método retorna hospedado `hwnd` para [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] para controles que hospedam `hwnd` objetos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> that is associated with an element that immediately hosts an `hwnd` must override this method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>que está associado um elemento que hospeda imediatamente um `hwnd` devem substituir este método.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: If this method is not overridden, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] places the `hwnd` as a child element of the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> that hosts the whole application.
trans-unit.target: Se esse método não for substituído, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] coloca o `hwnd` como um elemento filho de <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>que hospeda o aplicativo inteiro.</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>

trans-unit.source: Typically, you want to override this default behavior and set [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] to position the hosted `hwnd` parallel to the place where it is located in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] logical tree.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você deseja substituir esse comportamento padrão e defina [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] para posicionar o hospedado `hwnd` paralelo para o local onde ele está localizado no [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] árvore lógica.

trans-unit.source: Except in hosting scenarios, do not allow <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> types to override this method.
trans-unit.target: Exceto em cenários de hospedagem, não permita <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>tipos para substituir esse método.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: In addition to overriding this method, the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> types that are associated with an element that immediately hosts an `hwnd` must return the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> that is cast to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple> in response to WM_GETOBJECT coming to the hosted `hwnd`.
trans-unit.target: Além de substituir esse método, o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>tipos que estão associados um elemento que hospeda imediatamente um `hwnd` deve retornar o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>que é convertido em <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple>em resposta a WM_GETOBJECT proveniente hospedado `hwnd`.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: To get a pointer to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple>, call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.HostProviderFromHandle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um ponteiro, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple>chame <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.HostProviderFromHandle%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.HostProviderFromHandle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple>

trans-unit.source: This method returns the hosted <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnd" name="hwnd" href=""></xref> to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] for controls that host <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnd" name="hwnd" href=""></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Este método retorna hospedado <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnd" name="hwnd" href=""> </xref> para [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] para controles que hospedam <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnd" name="hwnd" href=""> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Gets text that conveys the visual status of the element that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o texto que transmite o status visual do elemento que está associado com esse ponto de automação.

trans-unit.source: For example, the status of a messenger contact might be "Busy" or "Online".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o status de um contato messenger pode ser "Ocupado" ou "Online".

trans-unit.source: The status.
trans-unit.target: O status.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus*>

trans-unit.source: The status.
trans-unit.target: O status.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes what kind of item an object represents.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia de caracteres que descreve que tipo de item de um objeto representa.

trans-unit.source: Examples of the returned string are "Mail Message", "Contact", and "Document".
trans-unit.target: Exemplos de cadeia de caracteres retornada são "Email", "Contatos" e "Documento".

trans-unit.source: The kind of item.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de item.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType*>

trans-unit.source: The kind of item.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de item.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"></xref> that is targeted to the element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> para o <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"> </xref> que é o destino para o elemento.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> control, the GetLabeledBy method gets the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> that is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o elemento é um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>controle, o método GetLabeledBy obtém o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>que está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: In the following image, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> "Themes" is targeted to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>; therefore the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey%2A> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> also targets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Na imagem a seguir, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>"Temas" estão direcionados a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>portanto, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey%2A>para que <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>também afeta o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>

trans-unit.source: When the user presses **ALT**+**T**, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> gets focus instead of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o usuário pressiona **ALT**+**T**, que <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>obtém foco em vez de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: ![Display properties shows labeled by usage](~/add/media/labeledby.JPG "Display properties shows labeled by usage") The GetLabeledBy method for <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer> returns the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer> for the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>.
trans-unit.target: ![Propriedades de exibição mostra rotuladas por uso](~/add/media/labeledby.JPG "propriedades de exibição mostra rotuladas por uso") GetLabeledBy o método <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer>retorna <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer>para o correspondente <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: This enables an automation client to get the text string that describes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que um cliente de automação obter a cadeia de caracteres de texto que descreve o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"></xref> for the element that is targeted by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"> </xref> para o elemento que é o destino de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"></xref> for the element that is targeted by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"> </xref> para o elemento que é o destino de <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a human-readable localized string that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> value for the control that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia de caracteres localizada legível que representa o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref> valor para o controle que está associado com esse ponto de automação.

trans-unit.source: The type of the control.
trans-unit.target: O tipo do controle.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLocalizedControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLocalizedControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLocalizedControlType*>

trans-unit.source: The type of the control.
trans-unit.target: O tipo do controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets text that describes the element that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o texto que descreve o elemento que está associado com esse ponto de automação.

trans-unit.source: This method calls the derived implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetNameCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama a implementação derivada de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetNameCore%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetNameCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name.
trans-unit.target: O nome.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>

trans-unit.source: You can think of this value as a string that users use to explain the control they are referring to.
trans-unit.target: Você pode pensar esse valor como uma cadeia de caracteres usados pelos usuários para explicar o controle está referenciando.

trans-unit.source: This property is used by tools such as Narrator to tell the user what the control is.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é usada por ferramentas como o Narrator para informar ao usuário o que é o controle.

trans-unit.source: For example, a button with a string "OK" should return "OK".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um botão com uma cadeia de caracteres "Okey" deve retornar "Okey".

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> control that lets users select a color might return "Colors".
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>que permite aos usuários selecionar uma cor pode retornar "Cores".</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Make sure that you have assigned a name to all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] so that accessibility tools such as screen readers can refer to each control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que você atribuiu um nome para todos os controles de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] para que as ferramentas de acessibilidade, como leitores de tela podem fazer referência a cada controle de uma maneira localizada.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the label.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres que contém o rótulo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the explicit control orientation, if any.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica a orientação do controle explícito, se houver.

trans-unit.source: The orientation of the control.
trans-unit.target: A orientação do controle.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation*>

trans-unit.source: The orientation of the control.
trans-unit.target: A orientação do controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> that is the parent of this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> que é o pai deste <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The parent automation peer.
trans-unit.target: O par de automação do pai.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the control pattern that is associated with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém o padrão de controle associado especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value from the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Um valor da <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: The object that implements the pattern interface; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if this peer does not support this interface.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que implementa a interface padrão; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se esse ponto não oferece suporte a essa interface.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> from the specified point.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> do ponto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The position on the screen to get the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> from.
trans-unit.target: A posição na tela para obter o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> do.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> at the specified point.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> no ponto especificado.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called from <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetPeerFromPoint*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, é chamado de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetPeerFromPoint*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetPeerFromPoint*>

trans-unit.source: The position on the screen to get the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> from.
trans-unit.target: A posição na tela para obter o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> do.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> at the specified point.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> no ponto especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this automation peer currently has keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o elemento que é associado com esse ponto de automação atualmente tem o foco do teclado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element has keyboard focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento tem o foco do teclado. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element has keyboard focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento tem o foco do teclado. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Triggers recalculation of the main properties of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> and raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged> notification to the Automation Client if the properties changed.
trans-unit.target: Dispara o recálculo das propriedades principais do <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> e gera o <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged>notificação para o cliente de automação, se as propriedades alteradas.</xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged>

trans-unit.source: Examples of main properties include, but are not limited to, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.LogicalChildren%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.BoundingRectangle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Exemplos de propriedades principais incluem, mas não estão limitados a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.LogicalChildren%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.BoundingRectangle%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.BoundingRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.LogicalChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, updates and notifications happen automatically after the update of the layout in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, atualizações e notificações ocorram automaticamente após a atualização do layout em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: (The update occurs in response to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated> event.) Sometimes, however, properties change without raising the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated> event.
trans-unit.target: (A atualização ocorre em resposta a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated>evento.)</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated> Às vezes, no entanto, propriedades alteradas sem gerar o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated>evento.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated>

trans-unit.source: For example, when the whole <xref:System.Windows.Window> moves, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated> event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando todo o <xref:System.Windows.Window>Move, o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated>não é gerado.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: In this example, the set of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.BoundingRectangle%2A> objects change because the objects are expressed in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Neste exemplo, o conjunto de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.BoundingRectangle%2A>objetos alterar como os objetos são expresso em coordenadas de tela.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.BoundingRectangle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Windows.Window> must call InvalidatePeer on its peer on <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, <xref:System.Windows.Window>deve chamar InvalidatePeer em seu ponto no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this automation peer contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o elemento que está associado com esse ponto de automação contém dados que são apresentados ao usuário.

trans-unit.source: A content element contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: Um elemento de conteúdo contém dados que são apresentados ao usuário.

trans-unit.source: An example of a content element is an item in a list box or a button in a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Um exemplo de um elemento de conteúdo é um item em uma caixa de listagem ou um botão em uma caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: You typically use non-content elements (which are also referred to as peripheral elements) to work with the content in a composite control.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você usar elementos de conteúdo não (que também são conhecidos como elementos periféricos) para trabalhar com o conteúdo em um controle composto.

trans-unit.source: An example of a non-content element is the button in a drop-down control.
trans-unit.target: Um exemplo de um elemento de conteúdo não é um botão em um controle de lista suspensa.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is a content element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento é um elemento de conteúdo. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is a content element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento é um elemento de conteúdo. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element is understood by the user as interactive or as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o elemento é compreendido pelo usuário como interativo ou que contribuem para a estrutura lógica do controle de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is a control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento é um controle; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is a control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento é um controle; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element associated with this automation peer supports interaction.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o elemento associado a esse par de automação suporta interação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element supports interaction; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento suporta interação; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsEnabled*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsEnabled*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the automation peer can receive and send events; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o par de automação pode receber e enviar eventos; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> hosts <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnds" name="hwnds" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o elemento que está associado a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> hosts <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnds" name="hwnds" href=""> </xref> em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Two examples of elements that host `hwnds` in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] are <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: Dois exemplos de elementos que hospedam `hwnds` na [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] são <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>

trans-unit.source: These peers must also override <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHostRawElementProviderCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Esses pares também deverá substituir <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHostRawElementProviderCore%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHostRawElementProviderCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> hosts <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnds" name="hwnds" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento que está associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> hosts <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnds" name="hwnds" href=""> </xref> na [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element can accept keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o elemento pode aceitar o foco do teclado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element can accept keyboard focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento pode aceitar o foco do teclado. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element can accept keyboard focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento pode aceitar o foco do teclado. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether an element is off the screen.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se um elemento está fora da tela.

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether the element is visible.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não indica se o elemento está visível.

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible.
trans-unit.target: Em algumas circunstâncias, um elemento está na tela, mas ainda não está visível.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is on the screen but obscured by other elements, it might not be visible.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o elemento estiver na tela mas obscurecidas por outros elementos, ele não fiquem visível.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o método retornará `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento não está na tela; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento não está na tela; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element contains sensitive content.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o elemento contém conteúdo confidencial.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element contains sensitive content such as a password; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento contém conteúdo confidencial, como uma senha. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element contains sensitive content; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento contém conteúdo confidencial; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this peer must be completed on a form.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o elemento que está associado com esse ponto deve ser concluído em um formulário.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element must be completed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento deve ser concluído; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is must be completed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento for deve ser concluído; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] is listening for the specified event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] está escutando para o evento especificado.

trans-unit.source: Typically, you call this method before creating the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> that raises the event.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você chama esse método antes de criar o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>que gera o evento.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: This method is a performance measure because if [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] does not listen for the event, it does not make sense to create a peer to raise one.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é uma medida de desempenho, pois se [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] não escuta para o evento, não faz sentido criar uma ponto a ponto para gerar um.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is static and only answers if a delegate listens for the specified event in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)], not for an event on a specific element.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Esse método é estático e responde apenas se um delegado de escuta para o evento especificado na [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)], não para um evento em um elemento específico.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] can create broadcast listeners; therefore the per-element information is irrelevant.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]pode criar ouvintes de difusão; Portanto, as informações por elemento serão irrelevantes.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_boolean" name="boolean" href=""></xref> that indicates whether [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] is listening for the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_boolean" name="boolean" href=""> </xref> que indica se [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] está escutando para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"></xref> proxy.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"> </xref> proxy.

trans-unit.source: The class that implements <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A classe que implementa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"></xref> proxy.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"> </xref> proxy.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"> </xref> especificado <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The automation peer.
trans-unit.target: O par de automação.

trans-unit.source: The proxy.
trans-unit.target: O proxy.

trans-unit.source: Called by the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> to raise the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AsyncContentLoadedEvent"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> para gerar o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AsyncContentLoadedEvent"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises an automation event.
trans-unit.target: Gera um evento de automação.

trans-unit.source: The event identifier.
trans-unit.target: O identificador de evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises an event to notify the automation client of a changed property value.
trans-unit.target: Gera um evento para notificar o cliente de automação de um valor de propriedade alterada.

trans-unit.source: The property that changed.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade alterada.

trans-unit.source: The previous value of the property.
trans-unit.target: O valor anterior da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the property.
trans-unit.target: O novo valor da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Synchronously resets the tree of child elements by calling <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore*>.
trans-unit.target: Modo síncrono redefine a árvore de elementos filho chamando <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore*>

trans-unit.source: Use this method in certain peer implementations that change the set of child elements in response to a call to a control pattern interface.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método em determinadas implementações de mesmo nível que alterar o conjunto de elementos filho em resposta a uma chamada para uma interface padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: An example is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider>, which can change the child elements of the peer by moving the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange>.
trans-unit.target: Um exemplo é <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider>, que pode alterar os elementos filho do par movendo <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider>

trans-unit.source: Sets the keyboard focus on the element that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Define o foco do teclado no elemento que está associado com esse ponto de automação.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*>
